summary: Royal decoration added library and cozier crafting area.
descriptionHtml:
================================ Description VER 1.2D ROYAL======================
If you like this mod please favorite and thumbs up.
If you don't, please leave a civil remark why it isn't to your fancy.
----Ashenfire

If you want to be rewarded for the most expensive house, then you will get what you paid for.
Now the adventurer can come home from a hard day of work and hang up her weapons.
She can remember....hey I remember when I did that.....

Just remember to purchase all upgrades.

This was supposed to have a library...but I was limited to only one bookshelf, sorry
no one answers my hail in the forums; to resolve the issue.


This mod had to be created seperately or alot of people would probably hate me that I overwrote
their esp file. This mod requires no additional help.

****** if you already have another Proudspire modification, please retrieve all items from the **
home and uninstall the mod. This includes Better Proudspire Manor 1.2b (non royal
version **
******



============================== END Description ==============================

Recommended Level to start: ANY

Hirelings: N/A
HouseCarl: Y, original housecarl

Story Line: No

Watch for: basement and bedroom upstairs.

Voice Actors N/A

HOURS of play: N/A

Fixed: Jan 2014
Fireplace is now traversable.
Reappearing immersion issues are gone now.
Cleaned up in preparation for new story line.

Fixed: apr 2013
Patio door won't lock you out any more.
Fixed issue where items should be purchased but were already present.
Wall items downstairs.
Clean up so cheaters don't get advantage of free basement without paying.
Fixed dialogue to purchase armory and guest bedroom from Falk Firebeard
Unclipped forge.
Existing shields will be on the plaque once house is purchased (like the one in the vertical glass container in
basement).

NO Containers were recreated or deleted, no items are in jeapordy of being removed.


ADDED: apr 2013
descriptions of rooms to the proudspire decoration guide.
Added tanning rack.
housecarl / guest bed.
Extended room for the bed.
dialogue with Falk Firebeard to purchase guest room & armory separately.
more lighting to basement to help people who use realistic lighting mods.
more lighting to guest bedroom.
Minor decoration changes.

Royal decorations, Mannequin display case, extra staff weapon racks upper bedroom;
bookshelf mid floor. Would have added many more but
game crashes if I do that).

More room in the crafting area.

MUST purchase all upgrades to get the full effect.


NEXUS: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24251


DAWNGUARD: No issues since this doesn't modify items Dawnguard relies on.
I don't have the DLC to test this mod with.


CREDITS: Agoon and Skyrim Wiki and my persistance....
author: Ashenfire

files.name: Better Proudspire - Ash - Alt - Royal - 2C
files.changelogHtml:
1. Added descriptions of rooms to the proudspire decoration guide. 2. Added tanning rack. Minor decoration changes.
3. Restored housecarl / guest bed. 4. Extended room for the bed. 5. Fixed issue where items should be purchased but were already present.
6. Added dialogue with Falk Firebeard to purchase guest room & armory separately. Unclipped forge.
7. Added more lighting to basement to help people who use realistic lighting mods. 8. Added more lighting to guest bedroom.
10. Clean up so cheaters don't get advantage of free basement without paying. 12. Existing shields will be on the plaque once house is purchased (like the one in the vertical glass container in basement).
